evidence.text: Person A: -we walked in the door, and        the table had just been         It was well after ten o'clock- cleared for dessert!

Person A: After driving around for hours in the dark looking for this damned camouflaged mailbox-
Person B: -and then what?!
Person A: Stop it! I can't breathe.

Person B: I kid you not; cow tallow and fruit pie!
Person B: -and poor daddy has such a sweet tooth! I didn't know how to warn him in front of everyone before he took a bite this big!
Person B: Is your father in?

Person A: Mrs. Toth! How lovely to see you! Do you need a hand?
Person A: Is Mr. Toth here, as well?
Person A: Daddy, has something happened between you and Mrs. Toth?
